subsection_content:
Doctor Thai shared that inguinal hernia has genetic factors, age, gender factors, and certain diseases such as prolonged cough, chronic constipation... People can prevent it by building a diet rich in fiber, green vegetables, fruits, drinking 2 liters of water a day, avoiding constipation; Avoid alcohol, tobacco, and stimulants; Avoid activities that cause great pressure on the abdominal area... In addition, people should go to the hospital for regular health checks and specialist examinations early when they have suspicious symptoms.
A diet rich in green vegetables and fiber helps prevent inguinal hernia
